description: Title and extent of operation of Code
Punishment of offences committed within India
Punishment of offences committed beyond India
Extension of Code to extra-territorial offences
Certain laws not to be affected by this Act
Acts done by several persons in furtherance of common intention
Illegal, Legally bound to do definition
Act done by person bound, or by mistake of fact believing himself bound, by law
Accident in doing a lawful act
Act of a child under seven years of age
Act of a child above seven and under twelve of immature understanding
Act of a person of unsound mind

notes: Replaced by Treason under BNS 152; Sedition term removed

description: Joining unlawful assembly armed with deadly weapon
Obstructing public servant in discharge of public functions
Disclosure of identity of the victim of certain offences
Negligent act likely to spread infection of disease dangerous to life
Rash driving or riding on a public way
Sale, etc., of obscene books, etc.
Deliberate and malicious acts, intended to outrage religious feelings

notes: BNS 103(1) punishes Murder; BNS 103(2) adds Mob Lynching

description: Punishment for culpable homicide not amounting to murder

notes: BNS 106 covers medical negligence with specific terms
Decriminalized broadly; BNS 226 restricts to stopping public servant

description: Voluntarily causing hurt by dangerous weapons or means
Punishment for voluntarily causing grievous hurt
Voluntarily causing grievous hurt by dangerous weapons
Voluntarily causing grievous hurt by use of acid, etc.
Assault or criminal force to woman to outrage her modesty
Assault to woman with intent to disrobe
Punishment for causing death/PVS of victim
Sexual intercourse by husband upon wife during separation
Sexual intercourse by person in authority

notes: Largely omitted; specific non-consensual acts covered under other sections
BNS 303(1) defines Theft; includes data theft
BNS 303(2) punishes Theft; Community Service for first offenders

description: Punishment for criminal breach of trust
Cheating and dishonestly inducing delivery of property
Using as genuine a forged document

notes: BNS 356(2) punishes Defamation; adds Community Service

description: Intentional insult with intent to provoke breach of the peace
notes: BNS 352 covers insult for breach of peace

description: Word, gesture or act intended to insult modesty of a woman
Punishment for attempting to commit offences

notes: New offence for syndicate based crime
New offence for snatching, card skimming, etc.
New dedicated offence for acts threatening sovereignty
New specific punishment for murder by group on ground of race/caste etc.

description: Sexual Intercourse by False Promise of Marriage
notes: New specific offence for deceitful sexual relations
Restricted to attempts to compel public servant; decriminalised general attempt
